description: After a hard day work, Spencer Reed comes home and finds an intruder Jake Woods in his house. Anger sets in because he busted his ass for his property and some punk is stealing them. Spencer catches Jake by surprise and ties him up with the extension cord. Jake pleads for Spencer not to call the cops. Knowing Spencer, Jake wishes that he has. Spencer uses and abuses Jake all night then fucks him in bondage until he screams for mercy.
title: Attack The Intruder
